mapper.select: SELECT id_title idTitle, title, start_date startDate, end_date endDate FROM travel WHERE start_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(#{date}, INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND DATE_ADD(LAST_DAY(#{date}), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
SELECT id_title idTitle, title, start_date startDate, end_date endDate FROM travel WHERE id_title = #{idTitle} ORDER BY start_date
SELECT a.id_sub idSub, a.sub_title subTitle, a.finish_yn finishYn FROM sub_title a INNER JOIN travel b ON a.id_title = b.id_title WHERE b.id_title = #{idTitle}

SELECT a.id_check idCheck, a.check_list checkList, a.finish_Yn finishYn FROM check_list a INNER JOIN sub_title b ON a.id_sub = b.id_sub INNER JOIN travel c ON b.id_title = c.id_title WHERE b.id_sub = #{idSub}
